00040 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00041 
00042 class Spamd extends Model
00043 {
00044     public $Name= 'spamd';
00045     public $User= '_spamd';
00046     
00047     public $LogFile= '/var/log/spamd.log';
00048     
00049     function Spamd()
00050     {
00051         global $TmpFile;
00052         
00053         parent::Model();
00054         
00055         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/libexec/spamd > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00056         
00057         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00058             $this->Commands,
00059             array(
00060                 'GetWhitelist'  => array(
00061                     'argv'  => array(),
00062                     'desc'  => _('Get spamd whitelist'),
00063                     ),
00064                 
00065                 'GetGreylist'   => array(
00066                     'argv'  => array(),
00067                     'desc'  => _('Get spamd blacklist'),
00068                     ),
00069                 
00070                 'SetStartupIf'  => array(
00071                     'argv'  => array(NAME),
00072                     'desc'  => _('Set startup if'),
00073                     ),
00074                 )
00075             );
00076     }
00077     
00078     function Stop()
00079     {
00080         $this->Pkill('spamlogd');
00081         return parent::Stop();
00082     }
00083 
00084     function Start()
00085     {
00087         parent::Start();
00088         
00089         // spamlogd_flags="-i em1"
00090         if (($if= $this->GetNVP($this->rcConfLocal, 'spamlogd_flags', '"')) === FALSE) {
00091             if (($if= $this->GetDisabledNVP($this->rcConfLocal, 'spamlogd_flags', '"')) === FALSE) {
00092                 return FALSE;
00093             }
00094         }
00095         $this->RunShellCommand("/usr/libexec/spamlogd $if");
00096     }
00097 
00098     function SetStartupIf($if)
00099     {
00100         $re= '/(\h*spamlogd_flags\h*=\h*"\h*-i\h+)(\w+\d+)(".*)/m';
00101         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->rcConfLocal, $re, '${1}'.$if.'${3}');
00102     }
00103 
00104     function GetWhitelist()
00105     {
00106         return $this->RunShellCommand('/usr/sbin/spamdb | grep WHITE');
00107     }
00108 
00109     function GetGreylist()
00110     {
00111         return $this->RunShellCommand('/usr/sbin/spamdb | grep GREY');
00112     }
00113 
00114     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00115     {
00116         global $Re_Ip;
00117 
00118         if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00119             $re_srcip= "($Re_Ip)";
00120             $re_num= '(\d+)';
00121 
00122             //87.109.52.69: disconnected after 466 seconds.
00123             $re= "/$re_srcip: disconnected after $re_num seconds\.$/";
00124             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00125                 $cols['IP']= $match[1];
00126                 $cols['Seconds']= $match[2];
00127             }
00128 
00129             //122.45.35.135: disconnected after 462 seconds. lists: korea
00130             $re= "/$re_srcip: disconnected after $re_num seconds\. lists: (.*)$/";
00131             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00132                 $cols['IP']= $match[1];
00133                 $cols['Seconds']= $match[2];
00134                 $cols['List']= $match[3];
00135             }
00136             return TRUE;
00137         }
00138         return FALSE;
00139     }
00140 }
